credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Coif
medium:
Medium: linen, metallic thread
Technique: plain weave with embroidery, lace and looping; stitches using linen: chain, satin; detached looping using metal-wrapped silk; withdrawn element work with overcastting and looping; cut work with needle lace technique fillings; spangles secured by a loop of linen thread wrapped with a short strip of metal
description: Linen coif, opened flat, with background entirely of metallic gold thread.  Pattern of tightly scrolled branches framing flower heads in which appear birds and animals.
name: Coif
